adjective.description: (of a person) tending to show feelings, especially of affection, openly.
Serving as conclusive evidence of something; giving proof.
(of a determiner or pronoun) indicating the person or thing referred to (e.g. this, that, those).

origin: Late Middle English (in the senses serving as conclusive evidence of and making manifest): from Old French demonstratif, -ive, from Latin demonstrativus, from demonstrare point out (see demonstrate).
